capsules_submitted.utterance: I've been noticing that Harry has this weird mark on his forehead. It's like a lightning bolt or something, and it's really sharp. I'm pretty sure he got it in some kind of fight or accident.

I've seen some pretty intense injuries in my time, but that lightning-shaped cut on Harry's forehead is something else. I'm not sure what happened to him, but it looks like he was struck by lightning or something. The wound is deep and jagged, with a weird glow around the edges. I can see why you'd be concerned about his safety - that doesn't look like a normal injury at all.

I've seen that before, it's a pretty rare condition. I'm not surprised Harry is experiencing some pain and discomfort from the injury. The lightning-shaped wound can be quite painful and may require some medical attention to prevent infection or further complications.
